td.content: s:patient presents with moderate photophobia, moderate night blindness, Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. she has history of moderate reduced peripheral vision. she is a 64 yo f retired. she denies smoking she denies drinking alcohol o:Height 153 cm, Weight 78 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 15 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed vitamin A - 50000 IU see comments, and ordered contrast sensitivity testing.

s:patient with C/O severe poor night vision for 9 days that is frequent. patient also reports severe difficulty reading, severe gradual decrease in visual field in the left eye. pt is a 66 yo white f. denies any alcohol use denies any smoking o:Height 154 cm, Weight 80.2 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 17 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

td.content: s:pt presents with 3 months history of severe poor night vision. pt also reports increased frequency of severe difficulty reading, severe gradual decrease in visual field in the left eye, Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. she is a female retired aged 66 Ys. denies any alcohol use denies any smoking o:Height 153 cm, Weight 78.7 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 16 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered retinal cell transplantation - Left eye.
